name: number-switcher-3000
description: An app for dealing with dial-in systems

scripts.build: babel api --out-dir dist && npm run build:foreverignore && webpack -p && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: cp app/robots.txt public/robots.txt && cp -R app/favicons/* public
scripts.build:dev: babel api --out-dir dist --source-maps && npm run build:foreverignore && babel test --out-dir dist-test --source-maps && webpack -d && npm run build:assets
scripts.test: eslint . && npm run build:dev && mocha dist-test/**/*.js
scripts.watch: babel api --watch --out-dir dist --source-maps & npm run build:foreverignore & babel test --watch --out-dir dist-test --source-maps & forever --minUptime 1000 -w --watchDirectory dist dist/run-server.js & npm run build:assets && webpack -d --watch

author: Jeffrey Charles <jeffreycharles@beyondtechnicallycorrect.com>
